tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(id)
);
